Posts.Content: Nov 12, 2013 04:27PM ladybugmommy2010 wrote: Misha thank you so much for your reply. The surgeon didn't say anything about my breast being fibrocystic but my aunt told me that on my dad's side of the family our breasts are fibrocystic. I have the pain that you mention, like right now it is hurting and has been hurting since I came home all one side. She did give me a physical exam, she also said based on my family history I should have been given a MRI and scheduled for the BRCA test. Thank you so much for sharing what happen to you, I feel a lot better. I started crying in the doctor's office because I felt like no one takes me serious.
